name: 1a - Is there any sign of damage on or in the switchboard?
1b  - If Yes, has the damage been repaired?
2b - If No, Have missing pole fillers now been installed?
3a - Is the Switchboard securely fixed to the wall?
3b - If no, has this been rectified?
4b - Have all RCBO's passed the test?
2 - Has a 90 minute test been completed?
3 - Have all emergency lights pass the 90 min test?
4 - Has the emergency log book been completed?
5 - Was a visual inspection carried out on each fitting?
1a - Have all lights been inspected in this area?
1c - If no, have they been replaced / repaired
2a - Have all lighting controls been checked?
2c - If no, have they been replaced / repaired
